author: newsr.in
title: Amazon deal: 10% off portable solar panels that charge your iPhone or Android with sunlight - newsR
text: Portable battery packs are great for charging your phone on the go, but at some point the inevitable will happen: you’ll need to charge your iPhone or Android phone but your portable battery pack will be dead. If only there was a portable charger that never needed to be plugged in and charged itself. If only there was a way to power said charger with something free and available in abundance, like sunlight… From now through midnight on Friday, October 16, you can save $10 on an Aukey 20W Solar Charger Portable USB Solar Panel Charger from Amazon. The smart design on this portable charger involves a series of solar panels that fold up into an envelope of sorts when the charger isn’t »
